channel.title: Poacher spike traps typo
channel.description: #### What happened? I sent out Spike traps to the king and it said "You will have your bear stand in the way of 3" #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? It should have said "You will lay out spike traps at 3's door" #### Steps to reproduce: Spike trap someone as poacher. #### Comments: https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/867368163164560021/71190A401A33675D8BB80464F7E8E6875B02831E/

item.title: Poacher spike traps typo
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
What happened?

I sent out Spike traps to the king and it said “You will have your bear stand in the way of 3”

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

It should have said “You will lay out spike traps at 3’s door”

Steps to reproduce:

Spike trap someone as poacher.

Comments:

https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/867368163164560021/71190A401A33675D8BB80464F7E8E6875B02831E/
